All Classes

Class Description
ActionToken
This abstract class represents an action token for the game's lorenzo a.i.
AdvancedPopup
This class is used for displaying complex popups, using an entire Scene as content
ArtificialIntelligence
This interface indicates that the implementing class can be used as an artificial intelligence for solo mode.
BasicDepot
This class represents a depot of the basic type, which are present in the warehouse at the start of the game.
BlockedResourceException
This Exception is thrown when a resource is attempted to be added to a depot that can't accept it because a different depot is blocking that resource type.
Card
This class represents a generic card in the game.
CardAlreadyActiveException
This Exception is thrown when the player attempts to activate a leaderCard that is already active.
CardColor
This enum contains all possible development card color
CardNotPresentException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted on a development card that could not be found
CardTable
Represents what in the physical game is the grid that holds all the development cards still available for players to buy
CardTableBean
Class used to serialize a CardTable object, send it over the network and store its information in the client
CLI
This class represents the executable for the game's Command Line Interface on the client machine
ClientReader
This class is run on a thread on the client and is executed in parallel with the user interface.
ClientView
This class represents the object used by the client to store game information retrieved from the server.
CLIWriter
This class is run on a separate thread by the CLI class, and is used to handle player inputs
Color
This enum contains all the colors used when printing
Command
This class represents a single command sent by the client to the server
ConversionNotAvailableException
This Exception is thrown when a white orb is asked to be converted into a resource for which a conversion is not available
DepotLeaderCard
This LeaderCard awards the user with a new Leader Depot in his warehouse upon activation
DepotNotPresentException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted on a non-existent depot by using the wrong depot number.
DevelopmentCard
This class represents the development cards in the physical game.
DiscountLeaderCard
This LeaderCard awards the user with a discount when buying DevelopmentCards upon activation
DoubleFaithToken
Represents the token that increases Lorenzo's faith by 2 points
EmptyDeckException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted on an empty card table deck.
Game
This class models a single game of Masters of the Renaissance
GameBean
Class used to serialize a Game object, send it over the network and store its information in the client
GameBoardController
This class is the GUIController which handles updating and interaction for the GAME_BOARD scene, the main scene of the game
GameController
This class represents a game's controller
GameDataNotFoundException
This Exception is thrown when a non-existent save game file is attempted to be accessed
GameFullException
This Exception is thrown when a player attempts to enter a game that is already full.
GameOverController
This class is the GUIController which handles the game over screen
GUI
This class represents the executable for the game's Graphical User Interface on the client machine
GUIController
This interface represents the controllers used for handling the interactive components of javaFX scenes and updating their contents
HostAndPortController
This class is the GUIController which handles choosing which host IP and port to connect to
LeaderCard
This class represents a generic leader card for the game
LeaderDepot
This class represents a depot of the type obtained after activating certain leader cards, providing the player with additional warehouse space.
LeaderIsActiveException
This Exception is thrown when a leader card is attempted to be discarded despite being active.
LeaderNotPresentException
This Exception is thrown when the player attempts to select a leaderCard that does not exist.
LeaderRequirementsNotMetException
This Exception is thrown when a leader card is attempted to be activated despite the player not meeting its requirements.
Lorenzo
This class represents the game's base artificial intelligence, whose actions are based on action tokens
LorenzoBean
Class used to serialize a Lorenzo object, send it over the network and store its information in the client
LorenzoTokenType
Enum used to indicate the type of a Lorenzo single player action token
MarbleLeaderCard
This LeaderCard awards the user a conversion for white marbles to a specified Resource type (when they are picked from the Market) upon activation
Market
This class represents the game's market
MarketBean
Class used to serialize a Market object, send it over the network and store its information in the client
it.polimi.ingsw.MastersOfRenaissance
This class represents the main executable for the game, it allows to select between booting the server, the CLI client or the GUI client
MessageWrapper
This class is supposed to be created and used by the Controller.
NotEnoughResourceException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted that is present in the object, but not in a sufficient quantity for the required operation.
NotEnoughSpaceException
This Exception is thrown when a resource is attempted to be inserted in a storage that is at full capacity.
Observable
This interface indicates that the implementing class can be observed for changes by Observer objects
Observer
This interface indicates that the implementing class can be an observer for changes in the state of Observable classes
ParametersNotValidException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted using input values that aren't allowed.
PersistenceHandler
This class is used by the GameController class to save its game's state on disk after every user command, and by the lobby to restore said games at the start of the server if the server was interrupted during their course.
PlayerBean
This interface indicates that the implementing class is used as a bean in the server - client communication, and is the type of bean of which a version exists for every player in the game.
PlayerBoard
This class represents one single physical game player board.
PlayerBoardBean
Class used to serialize a PlayerBoard object, send it over the network and store its information in the client
PlayerNumberAlreadySetException
This Exception is thrown when a player attempts to set the player number for a game for which it has already been set.
PopeFavorTile
This class represents a single Pope's Favor Tile and all of its distinctive parameters.
PopeTileState
This enum contains all possible states for players' pope's favor tiles
Production
This class represents a container that holds information about one single production that a player decides to activate during his turn.
ProductionHandler
This class was made to simplify the interaction between PlayerBoard and Production classes during a single turn.
ProductionHandlerBean
Class used to serialize a ProductionHandler object
ProductionIsSelectedException
This Exception is thrown when a selected production is attempted to be removed.
ProductionLeaderCard
This LeaderCard awards the user with the permanent addition of a specific Production in their PlayerBoard upon activation
ProductionNotPresentException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted on a non-existent production by using the wrong production number.
ProductionsController
This class is the GUIController which handles the selection of productions to activate
RemoveBlueToken
Represents the token that removes 2 blue DevelopmentCards from the grid
RemoveCardsToken
Represents the token that removes 2 DevelopmentCards of the specified color from the grid
RemoveGreenToken
Represents the token that removes 2 green DevelopmentCards from the grid
RemovePurpleToken
Represents the token that removes 2 purple DevelopmentCards from the grid
RemoveYellowToken
Represents the token that removes 2 yellow DevelopmentCards from the grid
Resource
This class represents the game's generic resource and marbles, used for the market and productions.
ResourceCoin
This class represents the game's coin resource and yellow marble
ResourceDepot
This interface indicates that the implementing class can be used as a depot in the player board warehouse.
ResourceFaith
This class represents the game's faith resource and red marble
ResourceJolly
This class represents the game's jolly resource
ResourceNotPresentException
This Exception is thrown when an operation is attempted on a resource which is not present in the object that throws the exception.
ResourceServant
This class represents the game's servant resource and purple marble
ResourceShield
This class represents the game's shield resource and blue marble
ResourceStash
This interface indicates that the implementing class can act as a generic container for resources as part of a player board.
ResourceStone
This class represents the game's stone resource and grey marble
ResourceType
This enum contains all possible types for the game's resources and marbles
ResourceWhite
This class represents the game's white marble
SceneName
This enum contains all javaFX scenes employed in the GUI
ServerLobby
This class represents the game lobby.
ServerMain
This class represents the executable for the game on the server machine
ServerMessageType
This enum contains all possible types of messages sent by the server to the client
ServerPlayerHandler
This class handles the server's connection with a single client
SettingsController
This class is the GUIController which handles the choice of the player's username and, if necessary, of the game's number of players
SimplePopup
This class is used for displaying simple popups with only a text message and a confirmation button
SingleFaithShuffleToken
Represents the token that increases Lorenzo's faith by 1 and then shuffles the entire action tokens deck
SlotBean
This class represent a "special" bean.
SlotNotValidException
This Exception is thrown when the player attempts to buy a development card for a slot that cannot hold a card of that level.
StaticMethods
Class used for keeping general purpose static methods
StrongboxBean
Class used to serialize a UnlimitedStorage object (in particular a Strongbox), send it over the network and store its information in the client
SwapNotValidException
This Exception is thrown when two depots are attempted to be swapped, and the resources of one cannot be added to the other.
TurnPhase
This enum contains all possible phases for the players' turn
UndefinedJollyException
This Exception is thrown when the production choice is attempted to be confirmed while there are still undefined jollies in input or output.
UnknownPlayerNumberException
This Exception is thrown when a player attempts to enter a game while its number of players has not yet been decided.
UnlimitedStorage
This class represents a storage for resources with no size limits or checks on addition of resources
UserCommandsInterface
This interface indicates that the implementing class can be used as an interface for the player actions called by the controller.
UserCommandsType
This enum contains all the commands the player can send to the server after the login phase.
UsernameAlreadyExistsException
This Exception is thrown when a player attempts to login with a username already taken by another player.
WaitingPlayersController
This class is the GUIController which handles the waiting screen for when the game's players are still in the process of joining
WaitingRoomBean
Class used to serialize an UnlimitedStorage object (in particular a WaitingRoom), send it over the network and store its information in the client
Warehouse
This class represents the player board's warehouse, intended as the collection of all of its depots (both the basic, starting ones and the ones obtained through other means).
WarehouseBean
Class used to serialize a Warehouse object, send it over the network and store its information in the client
WrongResourceInsertionException
This Exception is thrown when a resource is tried to be inserted in a storage that can't contain its type.
WrongTurnPhaseException
This Exception is thrown when the player attempts an action not allowed during the current phase of the turn.
